title: DDFP 244: Daniel Jeremiah on Johnny Manziel & Dan Hellie
itunes:title: DDFP 244: Daniel Jeremiah on Johnny Manziel & Dan Hellie
description:
Shek, Rank and Handsome Hank are joined by old pal and NFL Network's "Path to the Draft" host Daniel Jeremiah to discuss Johnny Manziel's pro day and D.J's current predictions for where the top quarterback prospects will land. A new "Black List" touches on Michael Vick's move to the New York Jets and pro comparisons for the draft's top players. Lastly, the face of "NFL Total Access," Dan Hellie, enters Studio 66 to talk about the latest moves in the NFC North and the Washington Redskins’ lack of offensive weapons.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
